issue.title: Reduce time to build and run integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15398](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15398). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The tests spend most of the time building each of the implementations, but most of the time only a small number of them changes.

The goal here is to see what can be done to re-use / cache the build steps of each of the implementation to only have to re-compile the ones that change.
